title: President Donald J. Trump Signed H.R. 390 into Law – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Law & Justice	

Issued on:
December 11, 2018
On Tuesday, December 11, 2018, the President signed into law:H.R. 390, the “Iraq and Syria Genocide Relief and Accountability Act of 2018,” which authorizes assistance to entities engaged in aiding individuals and communities in Iraq or Syria who are being, or are likely to be, targeted for genocide, crimes against humanity, or war crimes.
